divs: sighting detailsi laid down on one of the couchs ,i usually slept in the room .i had a strange feeling that something was levitating me,and then i awakened to a grey being standing in front of me. they had moved me in a setting up position on the other couch. . i could clearly see this (being) in front of me as i came to . it looked just like what you see in books, t.v., internet, etc. large black eyes, whitish grey skin tone,long fingers, slinder short build,(about 4-4 1\2" feet tall). i couldnt speak, or move. it told me (telepathically), that it meant no harm that it was trying to get information. i told it (telepathically),not to harm my family. it then had the other two bring out my *****.they carried her in the living room (one grabbing her under her arms on each side). she was in a deep trance with her eyes and mouth wide open.they then took her back in the room. it took either its fingers or a tool,and applied pressure in between my left eye and the top of my nose, or inserted something in my nose, not sure. it then applied alot of pressure in the same place which caused a considerable amount of pain.immediately during this (procedure), my lifes memories started going back in time.icould also see the light shade which was above me,reflecting in this things large,black,left eye.when they got the information they needed,they left. for several minutes after, i tried to call her name and was finally able to do so. she awoke, and sensed that something wasnt right. she said that when she woke up, that her panties were inside out. she also mentioned there were ripples in the bed which looked like she had been dragged back onto it.her panties were also halfway off.we were up the rest of that night, the next day, and the following night. we had difficulty getting to sleep because of what happened. since then, shes in denial of this, but i know that she knows the truth.
